duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute the software test strategy (where to test) for the scope of features being delivered - MiL/SiL (virtual environment), HiL (subsystem simulator), and/or ViL (Tractor).
Execute the software verification test plan (which test cases to run) for the features delivered and defects fixed.
Execute test specification/test cases for functional verification.
Execute appropriate level of regression testing required for each software release.
Establish and track software test metrics (requirements to test case coverage, test case data, test results, defects found, defect escapes ...)

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent work experience.
